(Simplified: 钤)
Chinese Definition:
①印章：鈐記(舊時印的一種)。
②蓋印章：鈐印。鈐章。
③鎖：鈐鍵(ａ．鎖鑰，關鍵；b。喻機謀)。
④兵書，謀略：鈐決(泛指兵書或謀略)。鈐謀(計謀)。韜鈐(中國古代兵法書《六韜》及《玉鈐篇》的合稱，亦指用兵謀略)。

鈐字的基本解释

鈐
qián
见“钤”。

鈐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qián］
［《廣韻》巨淹切，平鹽，羣。］
“钤1”的繁体字。亦作“2”。
(1)锁。引申为关键、要领。
(2)兵法。参见“鈐決”。
(3)祭器名。《山海经·西山经》：“其十輩神者，其祠之，毛一雄雞，鈐而不糈。”郭璞注：“鈐，所用祭器名，所未詳也。或作思訓祈不糈，祠不以米。”一说为祈祷之意。郝懿行疏：“鈐疑祈之聲轉耳，經文祈而不糈，即祠不以米之義；思訓未詳。”
(4)用以焙制茶叶的器具。
(5)星名。即鉤钤。
(6)官印。
(7)盖章；盖印。
(8)钳持；缄禁。
(9)威慑管束。
(10)钳刀。《资治通鉴·齐武帝永明五年》：“詔盡出御府衣服珍寶、太官雜器、太僕乘具、内庫弓矢刀鈐十分之八。”胡三省注：“鈐，與鉗同，其廉翻，刃也。”亦用为持刀。

鈐字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鈐； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1298第17
〔古文〕?【唐韻】巨淹切【集韻】【韻會】其淹切，?音箝。【說文】鈐?，大犂也。一曰類耜。　又【玉篇】車轄也。　又【廣韻】兵鈐以閉房，神府以備非常。　又【廣韻】鉤鈐，星名。【前漢·天文志】熒惑守房之鉤鈐。鉤鈐，天子之御也。【註】房爲天駟，其隂右驂旁有二星，曰鉤鈐，故曰天子御也。【石氏星經】二星主法，明則羣臣奉職，天下道洽。【孝經·內事】昆弟親睦，則鉤鈐不離房。【晉書·天文志】鉤鈐主關籥，王者孝，則鉤鈐明。　又山名。【山海經】西次二經之首曰鈐山。　又鏁也。【爾雅序】六藝之鈐鍵。【疏】鈐，鏁也。　又【揚子·方言】矛，其柄謂之鈐。【註】巨巾反。　又【集韻】胡南切，音含。釱也。　又千尋切，音侵。義同。

Basic explanation of words
seal
qián
See "钤".
seal
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qián］
["Guangyun" giant flooded cut, flat salt, group. ]
"钤1" in traditional characters. Also called "2".
(1) Lock. The extension is the key and essential.
(2) Art of War. See "Shooting."
(3) The name of the sacrificial vessel. "Shan Hai Jing·Xi Shan Jing": "The ten generations of gods, the temple, the hair is a rooster, the seal is not a scorpion." Guo Pu's note: "The seal, the name of the sacrificial vessel used, is not specified. Or as a contemplation and prayer.糈, the temple does not use rice." One said it meant prayer. Hao Yixing's commentary: "The voice of suspicion and prayer turns ears, and the scriptures pray but do not make mistakes, that is, the meaning of the temple is not to use rice; the thoughts are not detailed."
(4) Appliances used to roast tea.
(5) Star name. That is, the hook seal.
(6) Official seal.
(7) Seal; stamp.
(8) Clamping; forbidden.
(9) Deterrence control.
(10) Clamp knife. "Zizhi Tongjian·Qiwu Emperor Yongming Five Years": "Eight tenths out of the imperial imperial clothes treasures, imperial officials miscellaneous implements, Tai servant rides, Neiku bow and arrow swords and seals." Hu San Provincial Note: "The seal, The same as the pliers, it is cheap to turn, and the blade is also." It is also used to hold a knife.
seal
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　钤; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1298 Page 17
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Juyan cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Its drown cut, sound clamp. [Said the text] Seal?, the big plow is also. One said classy.　[Jade articles] Che administers too.　[Guangyun] The soldiers closed the room, and the gods prepared for it.　[Guangyun] hook and seal, star name. [Previous Han·Astronomy] The hook and seal of the fascinating guard house. The hook seal, the emperor of the emperor. [Note] The room is Tiansi, and there are two stars next to the right side of the Yin, which is called a hook seal, so it is called the emperor's imperial palace. [Shi's Star Sutra] Two stars dominate the law, and the ministers will serve in the Ming Dynasty, and the world will be in harmony. 【Book of Filial Piety·Internal Affairs】Kun's brothers are close to each other. [Book of Jin·Astronomy] Guan Yu is the master of the hook and seal, and the king is filial, and the hook is clear.　Also the name of the mountain. 【Shan Hai Jing】The first of the Second Western Classics is Qishan.　You 鏁也. 【Erya Preface】The key to the six arts. [Sparse] Qiao, 鏁 also.　[Yangtze Dialect] The spear, whose handle is called the seal. [Note] The giant scarf is reversed.　[Jiyun] Hu Nanqie, sound contains. Ye Ye.　 Chihiro cut again, sound invaded. The same meaning.
